    Method
    Description
    static void
    DataOperator.modifyMovieWithNewValues(Movies movie)
    When we want to modify the details of an existing movie in the database (Movies.txt), we can pass the modified movie object as parameter and the existing movie in the database will be updated.
    static void

    This method saves a new movie into the existing database (Movies.txt).

    static void
    DataOperator.overwriteMoviesDatabaseWithMovies(ArrayList<Movies> movies)
    This method overwrites the existing movie database (Movies.txt) with the new ArrayList of movies in the parameter
